Articles.Content: Is there a variable in a .cfg that controls the wobble between the parts? Or if not, are there ways to lower it? (no, I don't mean struts)

There's breakingForce and breakingTorque that everyone seems to know about. There may also be a way to set the dampening and spring constants from the cfgs or definitely via plugin(I'm working on one such now).

There's breakingForce and breakingTorque that everyone seems to know about. There may also be a way to set the dampening and spring constants from the cfgs or definitely via plugin(I'm working on one such now).

I thought the default joints were FixedJoints so didn't specify spring values (although you can of course replace them).
